text: Nodamuvirales is an order of RNA viruses which infects eukaryotes. Member viruses have a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome. The name of the group is a contraction of "Nodamura virus" and -virales which is the suffix for a virus order. ==Taxonomy== The following families are recognized: *Nodaviridae *Sinhaliviridae ==References== Category:Viruses
title: Nodamuvirales
